csdl.jupiter.model.columndata
Class ColumnDataModel

java.lang.Object
  csdl.jupiter.model.columndata.ColumnDataModel

public class ColumnDataModel
extends java.lang.Object

Provides the container class for ColumnData instances.

Version:
$Id: ColumnDataModel.java,v 1.3 2005/03/25 18:32:09 takuyay Exp $
Author:
Takuya Yamashita

Method Detail

add

public void add(ColumnData columnData)
Adds the ColumnData instance.

Parameters:
columnData - the ColumnData instance

addAll

public void addAll(java.util.List columnDataList)
Adds ColumnData list. Throws ClassCastException if the element of the list is not ColumnData instance.

Parameters:
columnDataList - the ColumnData list.

remove

public ColumnData remove(int index)
Removes the element at the specified position in this list. Shifts any subsequent elements to the left (subtracts one from their indices).

Parameters:
index - the index of the element to removed.
Returns:
the ColumnData instance to be removed.

insert

public void insert(int index,
                   ColumnData columnData)
Inserts the specified element at the specified position in this list. Shifts the element currently at that position (if any) and any subsequent elements to the right (adds one to their indices).

Parameters:
index - index at which the specified element is to be inserted.
columnData - column data to be inserted.

get

public ColumnData get(java.lang.String columnNameKey)
Gets the ColumnData instance from the columnNameKey.

Parameters:
columnNameKey - the column name key.
Returns:
the ColumnData instance.
